nodes.text: The Government Assembly was the name of the republic governmental system on the Bith homeworld of Clak'dor VII. Representatives from each of Clak'dor's city-states comprised the Government Assembly.

Weogar, the planet's cultural center, was home to the Assembly House, where the Government Assembly convened. Although Clak'dor city-states had different methods for assigning representatives to the Government Assembly, from election to hereditary appointment, all were equal in the Assembly House.
